posts.post_content:
A pretty nice Old Judge card for sale. $OLD dlvd. Also included is the envelope and correspondence from Lew Lipset, the seller of the card in 1986, to Mr. Kaplan from Vermont. Email with any questions [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Mike
